answerText: Dr. Watson [or John Watson][10] Doctor Watson is the companion of this sleuth who investigates cases like The Hound of the Baskervilles.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 1 | 18 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this former British Army surgeon who becomes engaged to governess Mary Morstan in The Sign of the Four. He discovers his old friend is still alive in "The Adventure of the Empty House."
